scripts.reset-db: npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run seed-db
scripts.seed-db: mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -u root --password=password < ./queries/seedUsers.sql && mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -u root --password=password < ./queries/seedEvents.sql && mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -u root --password=password < ./queries/seedAttendants.sql && mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -u root --password=password < ./queries/seedAssets.sql
scripts.container-down: docker kill mysql-container; docker container rm mysql-container
